      static java.lang.String escapeStrings​(java.lang.String realString, java.lang.String adminMOTD, java.lang.String adminName, java.lang.String adminMessage, java.lang.String playerName, java.lang.String consoleMessage)
      Posts a chat message Translates the color codes and escapes the following char sequences: {ADMIN_MOTD} {ADMIN_NAME} {ADMIN_MESSAGE} {PLAYER_NAME} {CONSOLE_MESSAGE} Some arguments are not used for some commands, therefore are set to a blank screen.

      • postMessageInAO

        public static void postMessageInAO​(net.md_5.bungee.api.chat.TextComponent rawMessage,
                                   java.lang.String staffChatSeePerm)
        The new way to post messages in the chat. If the permission variable is set to "", the permission will be set to the default permission in the config. This void will escape the color codes for you.
        Parameters:
        rawMessage - The Raw Staff Chat Message (e.g. "&f&4AO&f] &5hi")
        staffChatSeePerm - The permission to see StaffChat ("staffchat.see" by default)

      • escapeStrings

        public static java.lang.String escapeStrings​(java.lang.String realString,
                                             java.lang.String adminMOTD,
                                             java.lang.String adminName,
                                             java.lang.String adminMessage,
                                             java.lang.String playerName,
                                             java.lang.String consoleMessage)
        Posts a chat message Translates the color codes and escapes the following char sequences: {ADMIN_MOTD} {ADMIN_NAME} {ADMIN_MESSAGE} {PLAYER_NAME} {CONSOLE_MESSAGE} Some arguments are not used for some commands, therefore are set to a blank screen.
        Parameters:
        realString - Unescaped String
        adminMOTD - The MOTD of the server that the admin is on.
        adminName - The name of the Admin.
        adminMessage - The Admin's message.
        playerName - The TARGET's Name (The admin's target for some commands)
        consoleMessage - The console's message.
        Returns:
        escapedString Escaped String
